pages.text: Above the hemisphere of the Overworld exists a completely different kind of dimension: filled with numerous spheres that float away like small planets.$(br2)You can reach them by building a portal from $(item)Packed Ice$() (if it hasn't been changed by your modpack).

Here you will find numerous resources that are always hard to locate on the normal Overworld: spheres of gemstone, Spectrum's ores, and anything else your heart desires - unless you fall off a planet and plummet to your certain death.
